subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: As the Giants stuffed their gear and frustration from an unfulfilled 10-6 season into garbage bags for a long winter, the franchise looked to a future appearing both stable and uncertain.
snippet: As the Giants stuffed their gear and frustration from an unfulfilled 10-6 season into garbage bags for a long winter, the franchise looked to a future appearing both stable and uncertain.
